name: Pararnormal Dispatch (Alpha)
description:
Flock valley police, how can I help you?

In a quiet 80s suburbia, a sudden, unusual scream is echoing through the night. Two available officers, a senior one and a rookie, ride out to it's source. They may not like what they find.

Meant as a prototype and prologue of the game, therefore the full playthrough takes around 2-7 minutes. 

Discord: https://discord.gg/rDBXQaw8KS

Leave feedback about the game! It helps me decide if it is worth perusing as a larger project!

https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSdqpvZTq3W3w0MK-NyPfrfJXPjDiHuvsJuBYQPH...
